Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits termination of electricity or heat service during forecasts of extreme temperatures
Summary: Prohibits termination of electricity or heat service during forecasts of more than ninety-five degrees or less than thirty-two degrees.
LawCode: Amd ยง32, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting termination of residential utility service during forecasts of extreme temperature
